item.0: No matter how accomplished he is, a man is not truly complete as a person unless he has the love of a woman.
item.1: Many women are actually seeking special favors, such as hiring policies that favor them over men, under the guise of asking for “equality.”
item.2: In a disaster, women ought not necessarily to be rescued before men.
item.3: Most women interpret innocent remarks or acts as being sexist.
item.5: People are often truly happy in life without being romantically involved with a member of the other sex.
item.6: Feminists are not seeking for women to have more power than men.
item.7: Many women have a quality of purity that few men possess.
item.8: Women should be cherished and protected by men.
item.9: Most women fail to appreciate fully all that men do for them.
item.10: Women seek to gain power by getting control over men.
item.11: Every man ought to have a woman whom he adores.
item.13: Women exaggerate problems they have at work.
item.14: Once a woman gets a man to commit to her, she usually tries to put him on a tight leash.
item.15: When women lose to men in a fair competition, they typically complain about being discriminated against.
item.16: A good woman should be set on a pedestal by her man.
item.17: There are actually very few women who get a kick out of teasing men by seeming sexually available and then refusing male advances.
item.18: Women, compared to men, tend to have a superior moral sensibility.
item.19: Men should be willing to sacrifice their own well-being in order to provide financially for the women in their lives.
item.20: Feminists are making entirely reasonable demands of men.
item.21: Women, as compared to men, tend to have a more refined sense of culture and good taste.
